extends.description: A relative path to a base build.json to inherit from.

entry.description: A relative path to the entry file. Typically `index.ts`.

include.description: Controls whether or not to include this component in the individual component build process.

compile.description: Tells the invidual component build process to skip JavaScript bundling and compilation of TypeScript.

name.description: The name override to use when generating files for the component. Defaults to the directory name.

bundle.description: Flags relating to the bundling processes within the bundling build step.

pack.description: Controls whether the build process will generate a pre-built webpack distribution bundle or not. Defaults to true.

esm.description: Controls whether the build process will generate an ES module distribution bundle or not. Defaults to true.

additionalProperties.description: An array of relative paths to Sass/CSS stylesheets to build and include in the component assets generation process.
